name: Hot and Spicy Spinach Artichoke Dip
author: Ben&Alexmom
summary: A party favorite especially for those that like the heat.  Serve with tortilla chips or crackers.
ingredients: 1 (14 ounce) can artichoke hearts, drained and chopped
1 (10 ounce) package frozen chopped spinach, thawed and drained
10 slices canned jalapeno pepper, finely chopped
directions: Preheat an oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Mix together the Italian cheese blend, artichoke hearts, spinach, sour cream, cream cheese, jalapeno pepper, garlic, and crushed red pepper in a bowl until well blended
Spread the dip into the prepared baking dish
Bake in the preheated oven until the cheese has melted and is bubbly, 20 to 25 minutes
